title: will this laptop will suffice to play 'high visual quality'?
body:
I need help guys
I was going to buy this ASUS laptop and i was just wondering if the specs is acceptable enough to play in high quality.
(i checked the recomended system req but i just wanna make sure and know your opinion since the graphic quality of LoL had been upgraded)
here's the specification :

* **Screen**: 15.6" LED-backlit TFT LCD Display resolution: HD 1366x768 / 16:9 
* **Processor**: AMD Quad-Core A6-series APU for Notebook (A6-5200, 2M Cache, 2.00 GHz)
* **RAM**: 4GB DDR3L 1600
* **Storage**: 750GB SATA 5400RPM 2.5' HDD
* **Graphics**: AMD Radeon HD 8670M, 1GB
* ** Operating System**: Windows 8 (64bit)
* **Connection**: WiFi 802.11 (b,g,n) / 2 x USB3.0 / HDMI / VGA / RJ-45 / 3.5mm
* **Dimensions (WDH)**: 380 x 251 x 34.0 mm
* **OS Edition** :Microsoft Windows 8

thanks,
(PS :the recommended system req says 3GHz, so im a bit worried about the Processor.)

replies.body:
It should be able to run League fine. I dunno about it saying that you need a minimum processing power of 3GHz, because most of the power will come from your graphics card. I haven't checked it recently myself, though, so I don't know.

Oh, and if possible, format the drive and install Windows 7. Windows 8 just sucks with running games.
yeah.. i was actually planning to switch it to win 7. nevertheless, thank you :D
